jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Maintain data using powerful analytical software and applications to prepare reports and evaluate outcomes. Thereafter they prepare reports or give presentations to people, so both communication and the ability to get along with people are important skills for this job
jobsJson.description: Maintain data using powerful analytical software and applications to prepare reports and evaluate outcomes. Thereafter they prepare reports or give presentations to people, so both communication and the ability to get along with people are important skills for this job
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Working with raw performance review data and converting it into presentable graphs or table
  • Performing data analysis using statistical technique, from quantitative and qualitative data and turning the data into actionable insight
  • Providing report or dashboard for management/stakeholders
  • Involved in end-to-end process of performance management, including executing the performance review
  • Proactively analyze data to answer key questions from stakeholders related to performance management

• Bachelor’s degree from a reputable university, preferably from Psychology, Human Resources Management, Statistics, Science, or any related majors
  • Having 1-year experience in performance management or data analysis are preferred
  • Fluent in English, oral and written
  • Basic reporting skills
  • Analytical Thinking, Problem Solving, Written and Verbal English Communication, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Stakeholders Management
